00047         public MapLoader(MapXml mapXml)
00048         {
00049             this.mapXml = mapXml; // The XmlStruct to validate the map with
00050             this.xmlValidator = new XmlValidator(new MapXml());
00051         }

00053         public void reset()
00054         {
00055             stack = new Stack<XmlTag>();
00056             hero = null;
00057             BGM = null;
00058             background = null;
00059             objs = new Dictionary<string, Obj>();
00060             objects = new Dictionary<string, Obj>();
00061             moveableSpriteObjs = new Dictionary<string, MoveableSpriteObj>();
00062             planeObjs = new Dictionary<string, PlaneObj>();
00063             bulletObjs = new Dictionary<string, BulletObj>();
00064             enemyPlaneObjs = new Dictionary<string, EnemyPlaneObj>();
00065             events = new List<Event>();
00066             paths = new Dictionary<string,Path>();
00067             title = null;
00068             objective = null;
00069             scrollSpeed = 0.0f;
00070         }
00071 
00072         public Map loadMap(String filename)
00073         {
00074             reset();
00075             reader = new XmlTextReader(filename);
00076             if (!xmlValidator.validateXml(filename))
00077             {
00078                 Console.WriteLine("Fail to validate the given map, file might be corrupted or incorrectly created. Please check the syntax.");
00079                 //exits the program if desired.
00080             }
00081 
00082             while (reader.Read())
00083             {
00084                 switch (reader.NodeType)
00085                 {
00086                     case XmlNodeType.Element: // Open tag
00087 
00088                         /* Pushes a new copy of the tag into the stack */
00089                         stack.Push(mapXml.getTagFromString(reader.Name.ToLower()));
00090 
00091                         /* sets the attrib values */
00092                         while (reader.MoveToNextAttribute())
00093                             stack.Peek().Attributes[reader.Name.ToLower()] = reader.Value.ToLower();
00094 
00095                         /* Converts the tag into Map related value */
00096                         convertTagToValue(stack.Peek());
00097                         break;
00098 
00099                     case XmlNodeType.Text: // Tag value
00100                         setElementValue(stack.Peek(), reader.Value);
00101                         break;
00102 
00103                     case XmlNodeType.EndElement: // Close tag
00104                         stack.Pop();
00105                         break;
00106                 }
00107             }
00108             return new Map(title, objective, background, BGM, scrollSpeed, enemyPlaneObjs, objects, hero, events);
00109         }
00110 
00111         /* Should be improved to use polymorphism, such that tags[element.tagId].setValue(value) is possible */
00112         private void setElementValue(XmlTag element, string value)
00113         {
00114             switch ((TagID)element.tagId)
00115             {
00116                 case TagID.Body:
00117                     break;
00118                 case TagID.Head:
00119                     break;
00120                 case TagID.Title:
00121                     title = value;
00122                     break;
00123                 case TagID.Meta:
00124                     break;
00125                 case TagID.Obj:
00126                     break;
00127                 case TagID.MoveableSpriteObj:
00128                     break;
00129                 case TagID.PlaneObj:
00130                     break;
00131                 case TagID.BulletObj:
00132                     break;
00133                 case TagID.Details:
00134                     break;
00135                 case TagID.BulletType:
00136                     setBulletType(value);
00137                     break;
00138                 case TagID.EnemyPlaneObj:
00139                     break;
00140                 case TagID.Behaviors:
00141                     setBehaviors(value);
00142                     break;
00143                 case TagID.HeroPlaneObj:
00144                     break;
00145                 case TagID.Object:
00146                     break;
00147                 case TagID.EnemyPlaneObject:
00148                     break;
00149                 case TagID.HeroPlaneObject:
00150                     break;
00151                 case TagID.Map:
00152                     break;
00153                 case TagID.Event:
00154                     break;
00155                 case TagID.CreateObj:
00156                     break;
00157                 case TagID.Path:
00158                     setPath(value);
00159                     break;
00160             }
00161         }

00163         /* setBulletType's subproblem */
00164         private void setBulletTypeSub(PlaneObj plane, string value)
00165         {
00166             foreach (string input in getStringsFromValue(value, ','))
00167                 plane.addBulletType(bulletObjs[input]);
00168         }
00169 
00170         private void setBulletType(string value)
00171         {
00172             XmlTag bullet = stack.Pop(); // Has to pop the current tag, in order to see it's parent
00173 
00174             /* Shared tag between PlaneObj and HeroPlaneObject */
00175             if ((TagID)stack.Peek().tagId == TagID.PlaneObj)
00176                 setBulletTypeSub(planeObjs[stack.Peek().Attributes["id"]], value);
00177             else if ((TagID)stack.Peek().tagId == TagID.HeroPlaneObject)
00178                 setBulletTypeSub(hero, value);
00179             else
00180                 throw new Exception("BulletType does not have a parent called \"" + stack.Peek().Tag + "\".");
00181 
00182             stack.Push(bullet); // Puts it back in afterward.
00183         }
00184 
00185         /* This method eliminates all the whitespaces and adds the strings delimited by the delimiter to the return list.
00186          * Ex: value = "   \t\n   \tThis     \n, is \t,an \t\n\t,  example."
00187          * will return, inputs = { "This", "is", "an", "example" } */
00188         private List<string> getStringsFromValue(string value, char delimiter)
00189         {
00190             int index = 0, lastIndex = 0;
00191             string input = value.Trim(); // trim removes whitespaces on both end of the string, does not remove the whitespaces in between
00192             List<string> inputs = new List<string>();
00193 
00194             index = input.IndexOf(delimiter, 0); // finds the index of the first delimiter
00195 
00196             while (index != -1) // while there are more delimiters
00197             {
00198                 inputs.Add(input.Substring(lastIndex, index - lastIndex).Trim());
00199 
00200                 lastIndex = index + 1; // skips the delimiter char
00201                 index = input.IndexOf(delimiter, lastIndex);
00202             }
00203 
00204             inputs.Add(input.Substring(lastIndex).Trim()); // the last item is not delimited
00205 
00206             return inputs;
00207         }
00208 
00209         /* Needs an improvement, something like parentRef.behaviors.Add(new Behavior(behaviors[value], parentRef) sould eliminate this routine of if/elseif checkings; */
00210         private Behavior getBehaviorFromString(string value, ref EnemyPlaneObj parentRef)
00211         {
00212             if (value.ToLower() == "shootstraight")
00213                 return new ShootingStraightBehavior(parentRef);
00214             else if (value.ToLower() == "shoottarget")
00215                 return new ShootingTargetBehavior(parentRef);
00216             else if (value.ToLower() == "shootcircle")
00217                 return new ShootingCircleBehavior(parentRef);
00218             else if (value.ToLower() == "shootstraightangle")
00219                 return new ShootingStraightAngleBehavior(parentRef);
00220             else if (value.ToLower() == "evade")
00221                 return new EvadingBehavior(parentRef);
00222             else if (value.ToLower() == "chase")
00223                 return new ChasingBehavior(parentRef);
00224             else if (value.ToLower() == "selfdestruct")
00225                 return new SelfDestructingBehavior(parentRef);
00226             else if (value.ToLower() == "shoot")
00227                 return new ShootingBehavior(parentRef);
00228             else if (value.ToLower() == "behaviorcontroller")
00229                 return new BehaviorController(parentRef);
00230             else if (value.ToLower() == "linear")
00231                 return new LinearBehavior(parentRef);
00232 
00233             return null;
00234         }
00235 
00236         private void setBehaviors(string value)
00237         {
00238             XmlTag behavior = stack.Pop(); // Has to pop the current tag, in order to see it's parent
00239             EnemyPlaneObj enemy = enemyPlaneObjs[stack.Peek().Attributes["id"]];
00240             foreach (string input in getStringsFromValue(value, ','))
00241                 enemy.Behaviors.Add(getBehaviorFromString(input, ref enemy));
00242 
00243             stack.Push(behavior); // Puts it back afterward
00244         }
00245 
00246         private void setPath(string value)
00247         {
00248             int whitespace = 0;
00249             char[] searchFor = new char[] { ' ', '\n', '\t', '\r' };
00250             List<int> xAndYs = new List<int>();
00251             Path path = paths[stack.Peek().Attributes["id"]];
00252 
00253             foreach (string input in getStringsFromValue(value, ','))
00254             {
00255                 whitespace = input.IndexOfAny(searchFor);
00256                 if (whitespace == -1)
00257                     xAndYs.Add(Int32.Parse(input));
00258                 else
00259                     foreach (string xORy in getStringsFromValue(input, input[whitespace]))
00260                         xAndYs.Add(Int32.Parse(xORy));
00261             }
00262 
00263             if (xAndYs.Count % 2 == 0)
00264                 for (int i = 0; i < xAndYs.Count; i += 2)
00265                         path.Enqueue(new Waypoint(xAndYs[i], xAndYs[i + 1]));
00266             
00267             paths[stack.Peek().Attributes["id"]] = path;
00268         }

00270         /* Should be improved to use polymorphism, such that tags[element.tagId].convertTag() is possible. */
00271         private void convertTagToValue(XmlTag element)
00272         {
00273             switch ((TagID)element.tagId)
00274             {
00275                 case TagID.Body:
00276                     convertBody(element);
00277                     break;
00278                 case TagID.Head:
00279                     break;
00280                 case TagID.Title:
00281                     break;
00282                 case TagID.Meta:
00283                     convertMeta(element);
00284                     break;
00285                 case TagID.Obj:
00286                     convertObj(element);
00287                     break;
00288                 case TagID.MoveableSpriteObj:
00289                     convertMoveableSpriteObj(element);
00290                     break;
00291                 case TagID.PlaneObj:
00292                     convertPlaneObj(element);
00293                     break;
00294                 case TagID.BulletObj:
00295                     break;
00296                 case TagID.Details:
00297                     convertDetails(element);
00298                     break;
00299                 case TagID.BulletType:
00300                     break;
00301                 case TagID.EnemyPlaneObj:
00302                     convertEnemyPlaneObj(element);
00303                     break;
00304                 case TagID.Behaviors:
00305                     convertBehaviors(element);
00306                     break;
00307                 case TagID.HeroPlaneObj:
00308                     convertHeroPlaneObj(element);
00309                     break;
00310                 case TagID.Object:
00311                     convertObject(element);
00312                     break;
00313                 case TagID.EnemyPlaneObject:
00314                     convertEnemyPlaneObject(element);
00315                     break;
00316                 case TagID.HeroPlaneObject:
00317                     convertHeroPlaneObject(element);
00318                     break;
00319                 case TagID.Map:
00320                     break;
00321                 case TagID.Event:
00322                     break;
00323                 case TagID.CreateObj:
00324                     convertCreateObj(element);
00325                     break;
00326                 case TagID.Path:
00327                     convertPath(element);
00328                     break;
00329             }
00330         }
00331 
00332         private void convertPath(XmlTag element) 
00333         {
00334             string key = "", pathId = "";
00335             bool xReverse = false,
00336                 yReverse = false;
00337 
00338             Path value = null;
00339 
00340             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00341             {
00342                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00343                     key = attrib.Value;
00344                 else if (attrib.Key == "xreverse")
00345                     xReverse = bool.Parse(attrib.Value);
00346                 else if (attrib.Key == "yreverse")
00347                     yReverse = bool.Parse(attrib.Value);
00348                 else if (attrib.Key == "path")
00349                     pathId = attrib.Value;
00350             }
00351 
00352             if (pathId != "")
00353             {
00354                 if (paths.ContainsKey(pathId)){
00355                     value = paths[pathId].createMirror(xReverse, yReverse);
00356                 }
00357                 else
00358                     throw new Exception("Invalid path id: " + pathId);
00359             }
00360 
00361             if (value == null)
00362                 value = new Path();
00363 
00364             paths.Add(key, value);
00365         }
00366 
00367         private void convertCreateObj(XmlTag element)
00368         {
00369             int time = 0;
00370             string obj = "";
00371 
00372             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00373             {
00374                 if (attrib.Key == "time")
00375                     time = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00376                 else if (attrib.Key == "obj")
00377                     obj = attrib.Value;
00378             }
00379 
00380             events.Add(new Event(time, obj));
00381         }

00383         private void convertBody(XmlTag element)
00384         {
00385             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00386             {
00387                 if (attrib.Key == "background")
00388                     background = (attrib.Value != "") ?
00389                         (Texture2D)Texture.FromFile(_GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice, attrib.Value) : // This allows for dynamic loading of Texture
00390                         _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/background"); // Default value
00391 
00392                 else if (attrib.Key == "bgmusic")
00393                     BGM = (attrib.Value != "") ?
00394                         _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<SoundEffect>(attrib.Value) : // Needs to find a way to load dynamic soundeffects
00395                         _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<SoundEffect>(@"audio/effect/onCursorMoveEffect"); // Default value
00396 
00397                 else if (attrib.Key == "scrollspeed")
00398                     scrollSpeed = (attrib.Value != "") ? float.Parse(attrib.Value) : 0.65f; // default value
00399             }
00400         }
00401 
00402         private void convertMeta(XmlTag element)
00403         {
00404             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00405                 if (attrib.Key == "content")
00406                     objective = attrib.Value;
00407         }

00409         private void convertObj(XmlTag element)
00410         {
00411             string key = "";
00412             Texture2D baseObj = null;
00413             Obj value;
00414 
00415             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00416             {
00417                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00418                     key = attrib.Value;
00419                 else if (attrib.Key == "src")
00420                     baseObj = (Texture2D)Texture.FromFile(_GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice, attrib.Value); // dynamic loading
00421             }
00422 
00423             value = new Obj(baseObj, 0, 0);
00424             value.ID = key;
00425             objs.Add(key, value);
00426         }

00428         private void convertMoveableSpriteObj(XmlTag element)
00429         {
00430             string key = "";
00431             Obj baseObj = null;
00432             MoveableSpriteObj value;
00433             int vx, vy, width, height, moverate;
00434             vx = vy = width = height = moverate = 0;
00435 
00436             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00437             {
00438                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00439                     key = attrib.Value;
00440                 else if (attrib.Key == "obj")
00441                     baseObj = objs[attrib.Value];
00442                 else if (attrib.Key == "vx")
00443                     vx = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00444                 else if (attrib.Key == "vy")
00445                     vy = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00446                 else if (attrib.Key == "width")
00447                     width = (attrib.Value == "default") ? baseObj.srcRect.Width : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00448                 else if (attrib.Key == "height")
00449                     height = (attrib.Value == "default") ? baseObj.srcRect.Height : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00450                 else if (attrib.Key == "moverate")
00451                     moverate = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00452             }
00453 
00454             value = new MoveableSpriteObj(baseObj.sprite, 0, 0, vx, vy, width, height, moverate);
00455             value.ID = key;
00456             moveableSpriteObjs.Add(key, value);
00457         }

00459         private void convertPlaneObj(XmlTag element)
00460         {
00461             string key = "";
00462             MoveableSpriteObj baseObj = null;
00463             PlaneObj value = null;
00464             int hp = 0;
00465 
00466             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00467             {

00469                     key = attrib.Value;
00470                 else if (attrib.Key == "moveablespriteobj")
00471                     baseObj = moveableSpriteObjs[attrib.Value];
00472                 else if (attrib.Key == "hp")
00473                     hp = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00474             }
00475 
00476             value = new PlaneObj(baseObj.sprite, 0, 0, (int)baseObj.velocity.X, (int)baseObj.velocity.Y, baseObj.srcRect.Width, baseObj.srcRect.Height, baseObj.MoveRate, hp);
00477             value.ID = key;
00478             planeObjs.Add(key, value);
00479         }

00481         private void convertDetails(XmlTag element)
00482         {
00483             XmlTag details = stack.Pop();
00484             string key = stack.Peek().Attributes["id"];
00485             MoveableSpriteObj baseObj = moveableSpriteObjs[stack.Peek().Attributes["moveablespriteobj"]];
00486 
00487             bool killable = bool.Parse(stack.Peek().Attributes["killable"]),
00488                 bounceable = bool.Parse(stack.Peek().Attributes["bounceable"]);
00489 
00490             BulletObj value = new BulletObj(baseObj.sprite, 0, 0, (int)baseObj.velocity.X, (int)baseObj.velocity.Y, null, killable, bounceable, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00491 
00492             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00493             {
00494                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00495                     key += attrib.Value;
00496                 else if (attrib.Key == "amount")
00497                     value.BulletAmount = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00498                 else if (attrib.Key == "separation")
00499                     value.BulletDensity = (Int32.Parse(attrib.Value) == 0) ? 0.5f : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00500                 else if (attrib.Key == "interval")
00501                     value.BulletInterval = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00502             }
00503 
00504             value.ID = key;
00505             bulletObjs.Add(key, value);
00506             stack.Push(details);
00507         }

00509         private void convertEnemyPlaneObj(XmlTag element)
00510         {
00511             string key = "";
00512             PlaneObj baseObj = null;
00513             EnemyPlaneObj value = null;
00514             int x, y;
00515             x = y = 0;
00516             Path enemyPath = null;
00517 
00518             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00519             {
00520                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00521                     key = attrib.Value;
00522                 else if (attrib.Key == "planeobj")
00523                     baseObj = planeObjs[attrib.Value];
00524                 else if (attrib.Key == "x")
00525                     x = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00526                 else if (attrib.Key == "y")
00527                     y = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00528                 else if (attrib.Key == "path")
00529                     if(paths.ContainsKey(attrib.Value))
00530                         enemyPath = paths[attrib.Value].createMirror(false, false);
00531             }
00532 
00533             value = new EnemyPlaneObj(baseObj.sprite, x, y, (int)baseObj.velocity.X, (int)baseObj.velocity.Y, baseObj.srcRect.Width, baseObj.srcRect.Height, baseObj.MoveRate, baseObj.hp, enemyPath);
00534 
00535             foreach (BulletObj bullet in baseObj.BulletType)
00536                 value.addBulletType(bullet);
00537 
00538             value.ID = key;
00539             enemyPlaneObjs.Add(key, value);
00540         }

00547

00549             stack.Push(tag);
00550         }

00575         private void convertObject(XmlTag element)
00576         {
00577             string key = "";
00578             Texture2D img = null;
00579             int x, y, width, height;
00580             x = y = width = height = 0;
00581             Obj value = null;
00582 
00583             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00584             {
00585                 if (attrib.Key == "id")
00586                     key = attrib.Value;
00587                 else if (attrib.Key == "src")
00588                     img = (Texture2D)Texture.FromFile(_GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice, attrib.Value); // dynamic loading
00589                 else if (attrib.Key == "x")
00590                     x = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00591                 else if (attrib.Key == "y")
00592                     y = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00593                 else if (attrib.Key == "width")
00594                     width = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Width : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00595                 else if (attrib.Key == "height")
00596                     height = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Height : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00597             }
00598 
00599             value = new Obj(img, x, y, img.Width, img.Height, width * height / (img.Width * img.Height));
00600 
00601             if (key != "")  // Key is not required for Object. If not specified, use the one generated by the Obj class
00602                 value.ID = key;
00603             objects.Add(value.ID, value);
00604         }

00606         private void convertEnemyPlaneObject(XmlTag element)
00607         {
00608             Texture2D img = null;
00609             int x, y, vx, vy, moverate, hp, width, height;
00610             x = y = vx = vy = moverate = hp = width = height = 0;
00611             EnemyPlaneObj value = null;
00612             Path enemyPath = null;
00613 
00614             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00615             {
00616                 if (attrib.Key == "src")
00617                     img = (Texture2D)Texture.FromFile(_GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice, attrib.Value);// dynamic loading
00618                 else if (attrib.Key == "x")
00619                     x = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00620                 else if (attrib.Key == "y")
00621                     y = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00622                 else if (attrib.Key == "vx")
00623                     vx = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00624                 else if (attrib.Key == "vy")
00625                     vy = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00626                 else if (attrib.Key == "width")
00627                     width = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Width : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00628                 else if (attrib.Key == "height")
00629                     height = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Height : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00630                 else if (attrib.Key == "moverate")
00631                     moverate = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00632                 else if (attrib.Key == "hp")
00633                     hp = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00634                 else if (attrib.Key == "path")
00635                     enemyPath = paths[attrib.Value].createMirror(false, false);
00636             }
00637 
00638             value = new EnemyPlaneObj(img, x, y, vx, vy, width, height, moverate, hp, enemyPath);
00639 
00640             enemyPlaneObjs.Add(value.ID, value);
00641         }
00642 
00643         private void convertHeroPlaneObject(XmlTag element)
00644         {
00645             Texture2D img = null;
00646             int x, y, vx, vy, moverate, hp, width, height;
00647             x = y = vx = vy = moverate = hp = width = height = 0;
00648 
00649             foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> attrib in element.Attributes)
00650             {
00651                 if (attrib.Key == "src")
00652                     img = (Texture2D)Texture.FromFile(_GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice, attrib.Value); // dynamic loading
00653                 else if (attrib.Key == "x")
00654                     x = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00655                 else if (attrib.Key == "y")
00656                     y = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00657                 else if (attrib.Key == "vx")
00658                     vx = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00659                 else if (attrib.Key == "vy")
00660                     vy = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00661                 else if (attrib.Key == "width")
00662                     width = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Width : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00663                 else if (attrib.Key == "height")
00664                     height = (attrib.Value == "default") ? img.Height : Int32.Parse(attrib.Value); // default value
00665                 else if (attrib.Key == "moverate")
00666                     moverate = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00667                 else if (attrib.Key == "hp")
00668                     hp = Int32.Parse(attrib.Value);
00669             }
00670 
00671             hero = new HeroPlaneObj(img, x, y, vx, vy, width, height, moverate, hp);
00672         }
00673     }
00674 }
